attributes.action: Test all residents & staff in all Covid 19 affected Carehomes immediately.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently a few mobile testing units are visiting care homes. 89 mobile units will be deployed at the beginning of May. There are 100s of Covid19 affected care homes. It will take many weeks to catch up with the spread of the infection in new homes. By this time 1000s of vulnerable people will be directly exposed to this killer virus in their own 'homes' & not shielded.
Would you allow this to happen in the Lords? Weekly testing is then the only way to start shielding carehome residents & staff.
attributes.background:
Prioritise testing on 1. Hospital admissions of suspect Covid 19 patients 2.All staff and residents in Covid affected Care Homes 3.Regular weekly testing of all care & healthcare staff 
The community track & trace program is, as reported by Imperial College, is best done through symptom reporting.

rejection.details:
